info.title: HardwareSecurityModules
info.description: The Azure management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Hardware Security Modules.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
The List operation gets information about the Cloud HSM Clusters associated with the subscription.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API

get.description: The List operation gets information about the dedicated HSMs associated with the subscription.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return.

get.description: The List operation gets information about the Cloud HSM Clusters associated with the subscription and within the specified resource group.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The page-continuation token to use with a paged version of this API

get.description: Gets the specified Cloud HSM Cluster

parameters.name: cloudHsmClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the Cloud HSM Cluster within the specified resource group. Cloud HSM Cluster names must be between 3 and 23 characters in length.

put.description: Create or Update a Cloud HSM Cluster in the specified subscription.

parameters.description: The name of the Cloud HSM Cluster within the specified resource group. Cloud HSM Cluster names must be between 3 and 23 characters in length.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Gets a list of egress endpoints (network endpoints of all outbound dependencies) in the specified dedicated hsm resource. The operation returns properties of each egress endpoint.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the dedicated Hsm

resourceId.description: The Azure resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

AutoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster's auto-generated Domain Name Label Scope

BackupRestoreBaseResultProperties.description: Backup and Restore operation common properties

statusDetails.description: The status details of backup/restore operation

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the backup/restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the backup/restore operation in UTC

endTime.description: The end time of the backup/restore operation in UTC

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure blob storage container Uri which contains the backup

token.description: The SAS token pointing to an Azure blob storage container. This property is reserved for Azure Backup Service.

properties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

BackupResultProperties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

azureStorageBlobContainerUri.description: The Azure blob storage container Uri which contains the backup

properties.description: Properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

CloudHsmClusterListResult.description: The response of a CloudHsmCluster list operation.

value.description: The CloudHsmCluster items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

CloudHsmClusterPatchParameters.description: Patchable properties of the Cloud HSM Cluster

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

CloudHsmClusterProperties.description: Properties of a Cloud HSM Cluster.

autoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster's auto-generated Domain Name Label Scope

hsms.description: An array of Cloud HSM Cluster's HSMs

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connection resources

publicNetworkAccess.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster public network access

family.description: Sku family of the Cloud HSM Cluster

name.description: Sku name of the Cloud HSM Cluster

CloudHsmClusterSkuFamily.description: Sku family of the Cloud HSM Cluster

CloudHsmClusterSkuName.description: Sku name of the Cloud HSM Cluster

state.description: The Cloud HSM State. Values are: Deploying, ConfiguringSlb, Starting, Starting, Failed, Failed, Deleting, DeletingSlbEntry, InitialProvisioning, Updating

error.description: The error detail of the operation if any.

DedicatedHsmListResult.description: The response of a DedicatedHsm list operation.

value.description: The DedicatedHsm items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DedicatedHsmPatchParameters.description: Patchable properties of the dedicated HSM

networkProfile.description: Specifies the network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

managementNetworkProfile.description: Specifies the management network interfaces of the dedicated hsm.

stampId.description: This field will be used when RP does not support Availability zones.

EndpointDependency.description: A domain name that dedicated hsm services are reaching at.

domainName.description: The domain name of the dependency.

endpointDetails.description: The Ports and Protocols used when connecting to domainName.

EndpointDetail.description: Connect information from the dedicated hsm service to a single endpoint.

ipAddress.description: An IP Address that Domain Name currently resolves to.

port.description: The port an endpoint is connected to.

innererror.description: Contains more specific error that narrows down the cause. May be null.

values.name: Succeeded
values.description: The dedicated HSM has been fully provisioned.

values.name: Provisioning
values.description: The dedicated HSM is currently being provisioned.

values.name: Allocating
values.description: A device is currently being allocated for the dedicated HSM resource.

values.name: Connecting
values.description: The dedicated HSM is being connected to the virtual network.

values.name: Failed
values.description: Provisioning of the dedicated HSM has failed.

values.name: CheckingQuota
values.description: Validating the subscription has sufficient quota to allocate a dedicated HSM device.

values.name: Deleting
values.description: The dedicated HSM is currently being deleted.

resourceId.description: The Azure resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

privateIpAddress.description: Private Ip address of the interface

subnet.description: Specifies the identifier of the subnet.

networkInterfaces.description: Specifies the list of resource Ids for the network interfaces associated with the dedicated HSM.

OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint.description: Egress endpoints which dedicated hsm service connects to for common purpose.

category.description: The category of endpoints accessed by the dedicated hsm service, e.g. azure-resource-management, apiserver, etc.

endpoints.description: The endpoints that dedicated hsm service connects to

value.description: The OutboundEnvironmentEndpoint items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

etag.description: Modified whenever there is a change in the state of private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: The response of a PrivateEndpointConnection list operation.

value.description: The PrivateEndpointConnection items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: Properties of the private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.

groupIds.description: The group ids for the private endpoint resource.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: The Cloud HSM Cluster public network access

backupId.description: An autogenerated unique string ID for labeling the backup. It contains both a UUID and a date timestamp.

properties.description: Backup and Restore operation common properties

values.name: SafeNet Luna Network HSM A790
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a Safenet Luna Network HSM A790 device.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK1_CPS60
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 1 local master key which supports up to 60 calls per second.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK1_CPS250
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 1 local master key which supports up to 250 calls per second.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK1_CPS2500
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 1 local master key which supports up to 2500 calls per second.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK2_CPS60
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 2 local master keys which supports up to 60 calls per second.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK2_CPS250
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 2 local master keys which supports up to 250 calls per second.

values.name: payShield10K_LMK2_CPS2500
values.description: The dedicated HSM is a payShield 10K, model PS10-D, 10Gb Ethernet Hardware Platform device with 2 local master keys which supports up to 2500 calls per second.
